plasma: Mamiriro ezvinhu anosanganisira zvikamu zvinochajiswa (maion uye maerekitironi)
ionic: Bond inoumbwa nekukwezva pakati pemaion anochajiswa
covalent: Bond inoumbwa nekugovana maerekitironi pakati peatomu
metallic: Bond inoumbwa nekukwezva pakati yakanaka simbi cations uye delocalised maerekitironi
balancing equation: Chemical equation ine maatomu akaenzana echinhu chimwe nechimwe kumativi ese
mole: Chikamu chinoshandiswa kuyera huwandu hwechinhu (nhamba yeAvogadro yezvikamu)
nhamba yeatomu: Nhamba yemapurotoni ari mukati meatomu (inosarudza kuzivikanwa kwechinhu)
isotope: Maatomu echinhu chimwechete ane nhamba dzakasiyana dzemanyuturoni
oxidation: Kurasikirwa kwemaerekitironi kubva paatomu kana molecule
redox: Chemical reaction inosanganisira zvese oxidation uye kuderedza maitiro
activation simba: Simba shoma rinodiwa kuti kemikari iite
catalyst: Chinhu chinowedzera chiyero chekuita kwemakemikari pasina kudyiwa
thermodynamics: Bazi rekemikari rine chekuita nekupisa, basa, tembiricha, uye simba
endothermic: Chemical reaction inotora kupisa kubva kune zvakatenderedza
exothermic: Chemical reaction inoburitsa kupisa kune zvakatenderedza
